Key Match Events: Francisco Alvarez exited with back spasms in the top of the seventh inning.
Francisco Lindor made his return from back discomfort.
Luis Torrens pinch-ran and remained in the game at catcher.
Carlos Mendoza was ejected after arguing a strike call.
Post-Match Reflections: Francisco Alvarez reported feeling better after initial treatment.
Carlos Mendoza commented on the need to quicken time to the plate to prevent stolen bases.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Brewers stole six bases during the game.
The Brewers advanced bases on wild pitches and a passed ball by Alvarez.
